description:
The class play goes off without a hitch, but with a surprise twist. Afterward, Tomozaki seeks out Kikuchi for a conversation about their relationship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mahou no Tobira no Saki ni wa Kitto, Hoshikatta Mono ga Korogatte Iru
You`re Sure to Find What You Want on the Other Side of the Magic Door
魔法の扉の先にはきっと, 欲しかったものが転がっている
